Exciting news from our Ramona High School FFA! We received word that 2019 graduate and Ramona FFA Member, Trevor Herman, was named a National Finalist in the Agricultural Mechanics Repair and Maintenance Placement Proficiency! This means that his project and application was one of the top 4 in the nation!

Preparing for this took many hours of hard work, dedication, and skill development not only on his application, but on his project. California had 17 National Finalists in over 30 areas, and Trevor was the only finalist from Southern California.

Congratulations Trevor! We are so proud to have you represent Ramona High School and Ramona FFA! We wish you the best of luck in the National Finals!
